statements: SELECT * FROM course_materials;
SELECT course_id, lecture_material FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT presentation_material, lecture_material FROM course_materials WHERE course_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id <= 3 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT assignment_material FROM course_materials WHERE course_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_material, assignment_material FROM course_materials WHERE course_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM course_materials ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT lecture_material FROM course_materials WHERE lecture_material LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT course_id, assignment_material FROM course_materials WHERE course_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_duration > 60;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assignment_points > 50;
SELECT assignment_title, assignment_due_date FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_due_date ASC;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_duration > 60 ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date, lecture_duration FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date >= '2022-01-01' AND lecture_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY lecture_date;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_duration, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_duration < 45 ORDER BY lecture_duration;
SELECT * FROM lectures JOIN assignments ON lectures.lecture_id = assignments.assignment_id WHERE lecture_date < assignment_due_date;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_duration FROM lectures WHERE lecture_duration > (SELECT AVG(lecture_duration) FROM lectures);
SELECT * FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM Lectures WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Presentations ORDER BY presentation_date DESC;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_duration, course_id FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_duration > 60;
SELECT assignment_title, max_score, material_url FROM Assignments WHERE course_id = 201;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_duration > 60;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date, lecture_duration FROM Lectures WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Presentations WHERE presentation_duration < 45;
SELECT assignment_title, assignment_due_date FROM Assignments WHERE max_score >= 50 ORDER BY assignment_due_date ASC;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date, material_url FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_duration < 90 AND course_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM lectures ORDER BY lecture_title ASC;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_title FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title FROM lectures WHERE lecture_title LIKE '%Introduction%';
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assignment_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM lectures;
SELECT presentation_title, presentation_slides FROM presentations WHERE presentation_id = 100;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_deadline FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video';
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM lectures UNION SELECT presentation_title, presentation_slides FROM presentations;
SELECT lecture_title, lecturer_name FROM lectures;
SELECT * FROM presentations WHERE presenter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT assignment_title, deadline_date FROM assignments ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM students WHERE student_major IN ('Computer Science', 'Engineering');
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_date, lecture_duration FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY lecture_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lecture_title, lecturer_name, lecture_duration FROM lectures WHERE lecture_duration > '01:00:00';
SELECT presentation_title, presenter_name, presentation_date FROM presentations ORDER BY presentation_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT assignment_title, instructions FROM assignments WHERE deadline_date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY deadline_date LIMIT 3;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM students WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY student_name;
